description: RND Power Solutions slim charging station boasts three outlets and 2 USB ports and now has more amps than ever. This charger allows you to charge your laptop cell phone camera USB powered tablet and MP3 players all from a single power outlet so all of your digital devices are in one convenient location. RND Power Solutions charging station features a 2-port hub capable of charging 2 USB-powered devices at the same time with a total of 3.4 amps you can quickly charge iPads and tablets. RND Power Solutions charging station also has built-in protection against power spikes protecting your devices from overheating. RND Power Solutions charging station securely mounts to any three prong outlet.
title: RND 3.4 Amp fast charging station with 3 AC outlets and 2 USB ports
